alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:48PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. Louis, east central Carlton and northwestern Douglas Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oliver, or near Superior, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Superior and Hermantown around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include City of Rice Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
